body: On the upcountry railway line, Station No 68 is Idalgashinna. This small town located between Haputale and Ohiya, in the Badulla district, is 1,615 m above sea level.Numbering eight lucky hikers, we started our journey from Haputale to Idalgashinna (IGH) sharp at 7 a m by foot. There were no dark clouds nor any signs of rain, and it was not so cold either. On our way,...
